description:
Offensive Security today announced the release of Kali Linux 2024.2 as the latest ISO snapshot of this popular Debian-based rolling distribution for ethical hacking and penetration testing.

The post Kali Linux 2024.2 Ethical Hacking Distro Released With GNOME 46, New Tools appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Kali Linux 2024.2 Ethical Hacking Distro Released With GNOME 46, New Tools

description:
DuckDB 1.0, a SQL OLAP database management system, has launched with enhanced stability and new features.

The post DuckDB Hits Major Milestone With 1.0 Release appeared first on Linux Today.
title: DuckDB Hits Major Milestone With 1.0 Release

description:
Canonical announced that the Ubuntu 23.10 “Mantic Minotaur” release will reach end-of-life on July 11th, 2024, urging users to upgrade to a newer, supported Ubuntu release.

The post Ubuntu 23.10 “Mantic Minotaur” to Reach End of Life on July 11 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Ubuntu 23.10 “Mantic Minotaur” to Reach End of Life on July 11
